name: Please Don't Scribble Me
description:
This game was created for the Vylocity 2022 Game Jam, which is the first of its kind. Vylocity is a game engine/framework that makes 2D multiplayer game development an absolute breeze, which is the only way I was able to make this in a weekend.

Credits
I did all of the programming and design for this project, but I used free assets from amazing creators to do  so!
Art: Kenney, and me modifying some of Kenney's work
Music: James Hammond
SFX: Kenney, Shapeforms Audio

Honorable mention to my wife for letting me do this for an entire weekend, helping play test, and also coming up with most of the words used in the names for players.

Special thanks to Veek for helping me troubleshoot some bugs in the wee hours of the night and morning, and for making and supporting the engine the game was made in, Vylocity!
